name: turboscript
description: Super charged JavaScript for parallel programming and WebAssembly

scripts.add:nodev8: rm -rf nodev8 && mkdir nodev8 && curl https://nodejs.org/download/nightly/v8.0.0-nightly20170406a94a5da78c/node-v8.0.0-nightly20170406a94a5da78c-linux-x64.tar.xz -s -o node-v8.tar.xz && tar -xJf node-v8.tar.xz -C nodev8 --strip-components 1 && rm node-v8.tar.xz
scripts.test:utils.spec: yarn build:utils && yarn build:utils.spec && yarn run:utils.spec
scripts.tests:verbose: yarn pretests && set DEBUG=turboscript.spec ./nodev8/bin/node --expose_wasm node_modules/alsatian/cli/alsatian-cli.js build/tests/turboscript.spec.js --tap | tap-fail-exit-one
